text: Tayo me bhikkhave bhavā kāmabhavo rūpabhavo arūpabhavo
edit: Tayo me bhikkhave bhavā – kāmabhavo rūpabhavo arūpabhavo

translations.transtext: Monks, these [are] three existences: existence in the realm of pleasure, existence in the realm of form, [and] existence in the realm of formless beings.
